charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Roark were
training together with Brock.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_020: OK, I’m gonna turn up the pressure!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_030: You two will have to keep up!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_040:
Rock-type Pokémon Gym Leaders who are
always toughening up nonstop are a cut
above the rest!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_050:
And [Name:PlayerNickname ] here hasn’t
had a single complaint, either!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_060:
When it comes to endurance, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] might be
on the same level as us Gym Leaders!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_070:
In my book, that makes [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ]
Pokémon a rocking sync pair!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_080:
It reminds me of Red and Blue when they
challenged my Gym long ago.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_090:
They had unbreakable spirits and rock-hard
will—just like you!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_100:
Onix and I have felt countless challengers’
burning desire for victory...
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_110:
And together, we’ve taken their all-out
attacks!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_120:
Some challengers broke through our defenses
and claimed a badge, while others gave up.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_130: Each of those experiences gave us strength.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_140: Which is why our bonds are rock-solid!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_150:
The more hardship you endure, the stronger
you and your bonds will grow!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_160:
Exactly! If I’m like a wall that aspiring
Trainers have to smash into...
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_170:
I want them to never give up—to get over
that wall, no matter how tall!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_190:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. As a
challenger, what do you think?
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_0301_200: The higher the wall, the better!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_0401_210: Fwahaha! Spoken like a true challenger!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_0302_220: It’s tough if it’s TOO high.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_0402_230:
Hahaha! True! Deciding how tall to make our
wall is one way we Gym Leaders are tested.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_240:
When a challenger beats us, it makes us
happy too.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_250:
Having said that, we Gym Leaders do have
our pride.
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_260:
While we send off those who defeat us with
a smile...
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_270:
in our hearts, we want to beat them
next time!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_280:
Here on Pasio, though, we don’t need to
think about our duties. We can focus purely
on aiming for the top!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_290:
Yeah! And now that I’ve awakened my
arc suit, I can battle with all I’ve got,
just like any other sync pair!
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_300:
With our rock-solid bonds—and rock-solid
defenses...
charaepi_ch0015_90_takeshi/2301_1201_310: we’ll take on any opponent—and win!
